metadata.name: Stronghold
metadata.description:
Michael Grey thinks he’s an average person, living out an average life on Earth. 
But he couldn’t be more wrong. Michael is really a being of incalculable power, stranded with no memory, protected and jailed by THE STRONGHOLD, a secret group that has only one goal: keep Michael Grey from regaining his power and facing the Adversary. 
When one of their own falls in love with Grey, all bets are off. Slowly, Grey regains his 
powers. What happens next could destroy Earth as we know it.
